sentences.en: "Does Will intend to return with us?" Joanna asked as nonchalantly as she could.
sentences.cn: “威尔打算和我们一起回去吗？”乔安娜尽量装作若无其事地问道。

sentences.en: Again Tu Wei - yueh smiled nonchalantly and remained silent.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳依然冷幽幽地微笑,总是不说话.

sentences.en: I turned and started running nonchalantly back up court.
sentences.cn: 我就转身不动声色地向球场另一端跑去.

sentences.en: Lily screamed nonchalantly, " I don't have time to play with you. "
sentences.cn: 莉莉大叫一声, 然后不在意的说: “ 我没空跟你玩. ”

sentences.en: Oh, it's just a statue nonchalantly.
sentences.cn: 喔, 那只是一座雕像.

sentences.en: She shrugged nonchalantly and turned away.
sentences.cn: 她毫不在乎地耸耸肩,扭头走了.

sentences.en: So says my oldest nonchalantly as he go in the car yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天大儿子上车时就这样问我.

sentences.en: The farmer nonchalantly learned out beyond the doorframe to glance down the field. "The cow with big black spots on it?" the farmer asked slowly.
sentences.cn: 农夫冷冷地靠在门框后，把农场打量了一遍。“是那只身上有两个大黑斑的母牛吗？”农夫慢悠悠问道。

trans.tran_cn: 漠不关心地，无动于衷地
